mean_cn: v. 传授花粉给；  n. 【植】花粉
mean_en: the very fine usually yellow dust that is produced by a plant and that is carried to other plants of the same kind usually by wind or insects so that the plants can produce seeds
sentence: Pollen carried by bees is responsible for the reproduction of flowers.
sentence_trans: 蜜蜂携带的花粉主要是负责完成花的繁殖过程。
